title: 300 - Combination Project
description:
Editing is a huge hobby of mine and after seeing the two 300 movies, this was a project I could not resist.

This is a reedited film that combines the two 300 movies together into one. 

Some scenes have been completely reedited or removed and some slow motion parts sped up, particularly in Rise.

Xerxes' back story has been removed, replaced by a much briefer version. I didn't deem the story necessary, keeping him mysterious seems to work better IMO.

Some scenes have been completely moved around.

It's merely a chronological edit of the two movies into one.

Runtime: 2 Hours 49 Minutes

-----------

This was created under Fair Use, an exception from copyright laws. It is merely a presentation of the power of editing and hopefully can be a good source for learning.
